name: take-home-task
description: Content moderation system with Laravel backend, Vue frontend, and WebSocket real-time updates

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:frontend: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && composer install && [ ! -f .env ] && cp .env.example .env || echo '.env already exists' && php artisan key:generate && php artisan migrate
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix '[{name}]' --names 'websocket,laravel,queue,vue' 'npm run dev:websocket' 'npm run dev:backend' 'npm run dev:queue' 'npm run dev:frontend'
